==== Definition of psychotherapy ====
Any use of psychological means to treat a psychiatric disorder or for [[Know the definition of psychotherapy OIC-073-01-A#%20msocom%201|[FB1]]] any other non-psychiatric problem causing psychological suffering or distress
----[[Know the definition of the term psychotherapy OIC-073-01-A#%20msoanchor%201|[FB1]]]<nowiki/>for too much?

question.title: What is the primary purpose of psychotherapy?
question.description: A psychological treatment for a psychiatric disorder or other non-psychiatric problem causing psychological suffering or distress

option_a.title: To treat physical illnesses
option_a.description: A plausible but incorrect option, as psychotherapy is primarily focused on psychological issues

option_b.title: To improve mental health and well-being
option_b.description: A correct option, aligning with the definition of psychotherapy

option_c.title: To alleviate symptoms of anxiety and depression
option_c.description: A related but incorrect option, as psychotherapy can address a range of psychological issues

option_d.title: To develop coping mechanisms for stress management
option_d.description: A plausible but incorrect option, as psychotherapy can address a range of psychological issues beyond stress management

correct_option.title: B
correct_option.description: The correct letter corresponding to the correct option
